body: I think we should only load those active extensions by using getActiveExtensions instead of load all extensions, so users can decide to enable/disable the default probe.

Hi,
Please have a look on this PR.
activate extensions support added

consumer为什么要获取provider的att?
参考下consumerContextFilter和ContextFilter吧，会删掉一些att的

我这也出现了，不知道原因。(Dubbo version: 2.7.6,docker部署的应用)
00:56:55.114 [dubbo-client-idleCheck-thread-1] ERROR o.a.d.r.e.s.h.ReconnectTimerTask - [doTask,51] -  [DUBBO] Fail to connect to HeaderExchangeClient [channel=org.apache.dubbo.remoting.transport.netty4.NettyClient [/10.10.0.81:55314 -> /10.10.0.75:20880]], dubbo version: 2.7.6, current host: 172.19.0.3,
org.apache.dubbo.remoting.RemotingException: client(url: dubbo://10.10.0.75:20880/com.alibaba.cloud.dubbo.service.DubboMetadataService?anyhost=true&application=by-pay-app&bind.ip=10.10.0.75&bind.port=20880&check=false&codec=dubbo&deprecated=false&dubbo=2.0.2&dynamic=true&generic=true&group=by-pay-service&heartbeat=60000&interface=com.alibaba.cloud.dubbo.service.DubboMetadataService&methods=getAllServiceKeys,getServiceRestMetadata,getExportedURLs,getAllExportedURLs&pid=1&qos.enable=false&register.ip=172.19.0.3&release=2.7.6&remote.application=by-pay-service&revision=2.2.1.RELEASE&side=consumer&sticky=false&timestamp=1597978981938&version=1.0.0) failed to connect to server /10.10.0.75:20880 client-side timeout 3000ms (elapsed: 3000ms) from netty client 172.19.0.3 using dubbo version 2.7.6,

的确是重启provider会这样,我在consumer上调用几次，发现就在不停的连接，注册中心返回的数据查了下，没有原来的ip数据。我的docker用的是swarm网络，容器重启后ip会变，计算机名不变。
This issue has been fixed in 2.7.8.
xml配置是走的spring吧

Sorry, I cannot reproduce the problem you reported. Please provide a demo so we can reproduce it.

We are also planning to move this extension to a new sub project called apache/dubbo-spi-extensions, you are welcome to continue asking there if the problem still exists.
阅读2.6.2版本的源码，觉得这个优化没必要吧，条件变量的等待队列里就一个线程，signal足够了，当然换成signalAll是没啥问题。是实际投入使用中出现了这样的问题吗？是什么样的问题呢？现在的版本已经使用CompletableFuture异步转同步了呢。

Dubbo version: 2.7.8 
Java version: 1.8
Nacos ： 1.3.2 
偶尔有报错：message can not send, because channel is closed
请问是否未来有提供支持呢？

应该是会删除的。RegistryDirectory实现了NotifyListener类，当收到服务变更通知的时候会触发。
具体的清除逻辑见方法com.alibaba.dubbo.registry.integration.RegistryDirectory#refreshInvoker，里面调用了
destroyUnusedInvokers方法销毁无用的Invoker

@tswstarplanet  Do you have time to work on this?

@Jaskey 如之前的留言，在用户有能力轻松实现扩展的同时，我们是否有必要把这个扩展加入到主干代码库中？

我个人认为，毕竟我们不能覆盖所有的使用场景，我个人不太建议把这样的定制化扩展放入主干中。我们是否可以考虑在 apache/dubbo-spi-extensions 子项目中找位置存放，这个子项目目前正在整理中。
Sorry @RonnieGandhi , I missed your comment. We are about to start this project recently, please let me know if you are still interested.

> Please try `Hessian2FactoryInitializer.getInstance().getSerializerFactory()`
> 
> The compatibility of inner implementations is not guaranteed.

有通用的解决方法吗？

I think the "onconnect" is used to trigger some action when the connection is created at provider side.
The trigger result will not be transport to consumer side.

If you have not other question, I will close this issue.

> I think the "onconnect" is used to trigger some action when the connection is created at provider side.
> The trigger result will not be transport to consumer side.
> 
> If you have not other question, I will close this issue.

As I said above, when I config "onconnect" or "ondisconnect" on provider side, these tow config will propagate to consumer side, which case an exception on consumer side.
lgtm

For all impls of org.apache.dubbo.rpc.protocol.AbstractProxyProtocol, the priority of supporting 'echo' is low. I also spent time today to look into how it's possible to support it for HessianProtocol and HttpProtocol, and I realize the efforts may be large, and it is unnecessary. After all, our major protocol is dubbo2 and in the future it is dubbo3.

My conclusion is: All AbstractProxyProtocol's impls don't support 'echo' today, and we don't have plan to support it.
Currently, can the end users get some notes about what you said in the documentation?
@beiwei30 could you help me?
We've added migration mechanism to support smooth migration.
thanks for your contribution

related with #6568 , fixed in #6571

Before port being exposed, there are many steps ,like Configuration validation, Serialization initialization, Protocol initialization and so on, after random port fetch. This will cause more than one provider fetch the same port because the port is not occupied.
If you want to start more than one provider at one time, it is more recommend to specify specific port for each provider.
In the production environment, is there a scenario where ports are randomly assigned?

> In the production environment, is there a scenario where ports are randomly assigned?

 Thanks! Even if you configure a fixed port, it is possible to deploy multiple instances on one machine，then "Address already in use: bind" is s bound to occur. 

I do configure dubbo protocol port to be random because I wonder if it is possible to completely ignore the concerns about port configuration.

> Before port being exposed, there are many steps ,like Configuration validation, Serialization initialization, Protocol initialization and so on, after random port fetch. This will cause more than one provider fetch the same port because the port is not occupied.
> If you want to start more than one provider at one time, it is more recommend to specify specific port for each provider.

Thanks!  Is it possible that we completely ignore the concerns about dubbo protocol port configuration when we use dubbo

Same problem.
解决了？同求

在2.7.x较早的版本中，ConfigCenterConfig中的namespace等属性，都有一个@Parameter注解，在ConfigCenterConfig实例转换成URL的时候，构建Url实体的parameter时，key使用的是@Parameter里面的key属性。读取逻辑见org.apache.dubbo.common.constants.CommonConstants.CONFIG_NAMESPACE_KEY;

在2.7.x近期的版本中，ConfigCenterConfig中的namespace等属性去掉了@Parameter注解，构建Url的时候，key使用的是属性名本身。

但是在Apollo、etcd等配置中心的实现类，比如ApolloDynamicConfiguration中，读取namespace的key使用的还是org.apache.dubbo.common.constants.CommonConstants.CONFIG_NAMESPACE_KEY，导致读取失败。

详情修改见   #6717
